ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: When you have a pet class it makes perfect sense. If you had wanted to be able to meele you should of picked a warrior or something else. Seriously what are
ygData.messageBody:
When you have a pet class it makes perfect sense. If you had wanted to be
able to meele you should of picked a warrior or something else. Seriously
what are you mad about? Some other class can do something you can't? grass
is greener comes to my mind.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 27, 2000 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>>
>> Heh bards aren't melee classes they don't even have double attack and
until
>> you get a yekeshas or two you can't do much.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>
>That's my point. Necros aren't melee classes either, and are
>supposed to be less of a melee class than bards. Therefore it
>doesn't make sense that they have the ability to do more melee
>damage than bards.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
